resources.string: Welcome to DoorWatch! Your doorstep, always in view. Let\'s get started!
Are you sure you want to logout?
Please enter valid email and password
Please enter a valid email address.
Account not found. Please sign up.
Password must be at least 8 characters
Password must contain at least one digit.
Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
Password must contain at least one valid special character (!@#$%^&*+=?-).
Registered Successfully. Please check your email for verification
Verify the email before joining in!
Failed to save user profile information. Please try again
An account with this email already exists!
Connect your device by entering the code found on the back of the camera or scan the QR code
Select where you want to add the device
"Please provide your email to reset your password "

We are a small team of engineering students from Concordia University. This application is a project for the ELEC 390 course given by our institution. Our mission is to transform the way families experience safety and security through cutting-edge technology. Our product is designed to provide families with an unparalleled sense of protection and peace of mind. We are to design an android-based app that utilizes advanced motion capture monitoring devices that will alert families of any detected motion in houses.

General inquiries: 

 If you have a block on your account, questions about policies or procedures, are unsure where to turn to, or have general questions. 

 +1 (514) 000-0000 
 motionsensor@doorwatch.ca

Before using the Application, please read and understand the following disclaimer: 
 
 Limited Liability: 

 The Application is provided "as is" without any warranties, expressed or implied. Our team assume no responsibility for the reliability, accuracy, or completeness of the content captured by the surveillance camera. 

 Legal Compliance: 

 Users of the Application are solely responsible for ensuring that their use complies with all applicable laws and regulations. This includes but is not limited to privacy laws, consent requirements, and any other relevant legislation concerning surveillance and data protection. 

 Not a Substitute for Security Measures: 

 The Application is intended to enhance home security, but it is not a substitute for other security measures. Users are advised to implement a comprehensive security strategy, including but not limited to physical security measures, alarms, and professional monitoring. 

 Network and Device Security: 

 Users are responsible for ensuring the security of their network and connected devices. Our institution is not liable for any unauthorized access to the Application or the data it captures due to inadequate network or device security. 

 Privacy Considerations: 

 Users are encouraged to respect the privacy of individuals captured by the surveillance camera. It is the responsibility of the user to obtain any necessary consents and permissions required by law before using the Application. 

 Data Storage: 

 We do not store or have access to the video footage captured by the surveillance camera. The data is directly sent to the user's phone device. Users are advised to implement appropriate measures for the secure storage of the captured footage. 

 Technical Limitations: 

 The Application may have technical limitations, and we do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free operation. Users acknowledge that the performance of the Application may be affected by factors beyond the team's control. 

 By using the Application, users agree to accept all responsibility for its use and understand the limitations outlined in this disclaimer. We reserves the right to update or modify this disclaimer at any time.
